name: The story through Maths and Puzzles
name_original: The story through Maths and Puzzles
description:
This game is still in creation, some features may not work, please enjoy!

The game is designed to test the following areas of Maths and number

The castle - Think of a number challenge to exit the castle then a big chase

The forest - Prime numbers, multiplication and division.  collect prime numbers to progress the puzzles. move boulders, use magic and defeat enemies too.

The cave - Ratios, mix and match the correct amount of proportion of ratios for each element of Earth, Water, Fire and Wind and use this to kill 4 legendary monsters of Earth, Water Fire and Wind

The desert - positive and negative numbers. Every time you click on coloured square your temperature will change. the first time you click on it, the coloured square will disappear, but beware for every other click on that square will keep incrementing the number so just be cautious of this.

For this test  you will Start off in the desert. This is actually the ending of the game, where temperatures soar from boiling to freezing. The objective keep within the temperature boundaries and fight an simple test boss at the end.

Progressing through the Desert you will see squares filled in the following colours either ice white or sandy brown. Icy white represents you will get colder (-). Therefore it creates an additional (- ) sign on top of existing number and sign.  If you step on that square, then a  recalculation is done by checking the current number of the square itself.  

Extra Cold

Also Sandy brown, represents extra heat (+). This creates an additional (+) sign on top of existing number and sign .  If you step on that square, then a recalculation is done by checking the current number of the square itself.  

Extra Hot

The Desert starts with an evil person greets you and says must not exceed 30 degrees or colder then -30 else you will die.

Hope you enjoy, please post feedback!
